title: Dear Santa
description: HIS DAUGHTER'S BIRTH MADE HIM A FATHER. BECOMING A DADDY WOULDTAKE A BIT LONGER.…Connecticut mogul Grant Braeburn never thought he was father material, even though his nearly four-year-old daughter should have convinced him otherwise. But then his ex-wife's death made him Haley's permanent parent. Her only parent. He needed help, in a hurry.It came in the form of Mia Vaccaro, the lively, lovely party planner who had been his ex-wife's best friend. Mia was the only one who could touch Haley's broken heart. And, Grant was becoming increasingly aware, his as well.…
author: Karen Templeton
